*UPDATE* Our usual Sunday venue is temporarily closed for refurbishment, so on Sun 2 Feb and Sun 9 Feb we'll be at a different venue. See the location on this event page.

-------------------------------------
Hi! :) Our weekly international party and language exchange meetup is this Sunday from 6:30pm to 9.30pm.

It's free and there are 150 of us every week. Come and make the most of your weekend with lots of great guys and girls. And you can practise your languages whilst speaking with native speakers.

See venue details above. It's free entry, just show the door staff your government photo ID and ask them for a wristband for the Mammoth Language Exchange event, then join us in our private area.

We give everyone name & language badges to make it easy to meet people who speak the language that you want to practise, and there are games on tables as ice breakers. And with the wristband we get discounts on drinks.

It's best if you arrive early but you're welcome to come a little later, and it's fine for you to come on your own. Everyone is welcoming and happy to chat. Most of the guys and girls come every Sunday and make some good friends here.

See you there this Sunday! :)

A most wonderful four day long weekend in this most beautiful and historic port city on the Atlantic coast in western France the veritable home of red wine and a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 2007 !

On the first day we shall meet at 3.45pm for 4pm by CitÃ© du Vin by Pont Jacques Chaban Delmas and then take a wander along the River Garonne and discover the Old City that is absolutely full of 18th-19th century mansions, art galleries, the famed Gothic Cathedrale Saint-Andre and Eglise Sainte-Croix de Bordeaux.
After the stroll we shall buy train tickets at around 5.15pm as follows at Bordeaux Saint-Jean train station, or you may wish to buy them in advance of the trip :

Sunday 11.10am to Marmande
8.09pm from La Reole

Monday 11.35am to Arcachon
6.02pm from Arcachon

Tuesday 10.11am to Saint Emilion
5.19pm from Saint Emilion

Sunday morning train at 11.10am - we shall walk 11 miles by the Garonne between delightful Marmande and La Reole - a most charming medieval town which we shall spend some time exploring.
We shall have an early dinner in gastronomic La Reole and then take the direct train back to Bordeaux at 8.09pm arriving back at 8.47pm ( last train at 8.52pm ).

On Monday morning from Bordeaux Saint - Jean station we shall meet as from 11.15am for the train at 11.35am to Arcachon and then bus on the Atlantic coast and walk around 7 miles the highlight being the 3 kilometre Dune du Pilat at 110 metres the highest sand dune in Europe that affords excellent views of the ocean ! Train back at 6.02pm.

Tuesday morning we shall dedicate to Red Wine by meeting at Bordeaux Saint - Jean train station as from 9.45am and then taking the train at 10.11am ( train back at around 5pm ) to the famous town of Saint Emilion and visit a distillery and maybe a vinyard too and shall certainly be tasting some much sought after wines ! Train back at 5.19pm.

Please book your hotel - either Ibis Bordeaux Centre Bastide or Ibis Bordeaux Centre - Gare Saint Jean through booking.com and then make a comment either Ibis Bastide or Ibis GSJ on the event page.
You may of course book any hotel of your choice in Bordeaux.

Easyjet flights return to Bordeaux :
Saturday 4th April
Gatwick 8.15am- 10.55am

Tuesday 7th April
Gatwick 10.05pm- 10.45pm

Luton 5.10pm - 5.50pm also available but you may have to forgo trip to Saint Emilion

Meetup fee Â£30 payable in advance by private bank transfer.

My no[masked].

Are you looking at doing something different this Valentine's Day? Would you like to meet and connect with new like-minded single ladies & gents?

Please come and join us for a wonderful evening where you will get to mix and mingle with like-minded ladies and gentlemen at the Tiger Tiger. All our members also get an exclusive FREE welcome drink. Join us and get started on making new connections and friendships! We also have an After Party to make things more exciting!

Join us on Saturday, 15th February from 6.00 pm onwards at the exclusive Tiger Tiger, where you can meet other single ladies and gents between the ages of 21 to 60 only. You will be able to interact with like minded people of your age group, relax and maybe exchange a few numbers.

Please click link to purchase your cheaper advance tickets:
Eventbrite: https://vdaylondon2.eventbrite.co.uk

Annual Pass- Â£30 each (plus charges) - Attend all of our events for one payment! Valid for 12 months from date of purchase.

Click on the link to purchase your Annual Pass today -
https://annualpass.eventbrite.co.uk

- We have our area reserved for Anna /Meetup. Please ask the bar staff for Anna and they will help you find the group.

- Anna will be at the venue from 6.00pm. He will welcome you warmly at the venue and will also help with introductions.

-We have 28 meetup groups in London with over 180,000 members and we will be inviting members of all ages from most of these groups. You will meet a lot of new people. (Members of other groups who RSVP are included as guests of the organiser in order to give you an idea of expected numbers.)

**We are not a dating group. Our group is created to help ladies and gents meet and make new friends. At times we may not have a gender balance, so please do not attend if a gender balance is important to you.**

- Event Cost (Tickets)

Please click link to purchase your cheaper advance tickets:
Eventbrite: https://vdaylondon2.eventbrite.co.uk

Click on the link to purchase your Annual Pass today -

First 20 tickets only Â£10 each
Next 40 tickets only Â£15 each
Next 40 tickets only Â£20 each

If you do not purchase your tickets in advance then you can pay Â£25 cash at the meetup to Anna.

(Note - 100% cashback is offered to all online ticket buyers who attend and do not meet ladies and gents at our event. Please ask the host for help if you need it. Refund has to be requested within 24 hours after the event and a feedback form has to be completed sincerely with valid reasons for your refund request. A refund request has to be made through the ticketing system you use to purchase the ticket.)

- Dress code - Smart casual/Leather shoes/Heels/No sports wear/Please make a little bit of effort. Please dress up please as the dress code is rather strict.

- Large bags and back packs by are not allowed and should be left in be cloak room of the venue.

-Please note that we have our private area which will have soft music early on. The overall venue gets very busy later in the evening and there is a DJ and dancing. Our members are very welcome to stay in the bar till 3am!

Join us! Fancy a few laughs and a beer or three? Every other Saturday you will find us hanging out and getting to know each other at Little Ku, where the whole top floor is reserved for us. Each week we have an even split of new and old members, there's no particular structure to the evening, just come along and introduce yourself!

Arriving towards the beginning and it's still a bit quiet? Fear not! The evening gets busier as time goes on.

After the main event, a group of us usually go out for a few more drinks, you are very welcome to come along. We look forward to meeting you for an evening of fun with an awesome international crowd! Please send Jenny a message if you have any questions.

Jenny

Meetup groups are not free to run and cost several hundred pounds over the course of a year. I do not currently make back the monthly fee despite a number of donations since May. I've put a link below (Paypal) where you give a one-off donation of 5 pounds (or any amount) to help out. The group will always remain free so there is no obligation but it would be greatly appreciated. The link works on both smartphones and computers.

To donate using PayPal: https://bit.ly/2KprZZf

A truly beautiful 4 day trip in these most remote, tranquil, rugged and absolutely spectacular Scottish islands !

Isle of Iona is a very special spiritual island and is vehicle free even !

The walks themselves shall be low level and not particularly difficult.

We shall be walking at times in beautiful woodland or along the coast so the terrain may at times be fairly challenging more than made up the fact that the views all round this island are quite breathtaking !

We shall be flying up to Glasgow on Thursday morning and then travelling to the island by taxi to Dumbarton, 12.53pm train to Oban and ferry crossing.
The same return journey shall be on Sunday afternoon with the train from Oban at 4.11pm arriving at Dumbarton at 6.47pm.

Return flights to Glasgow with Easyjet :

Thursday 16th April
Luton 8.50am - 10.10am
Gatwick 8.55am - 10.25am

Sunday 19th April
Luton 8.40pm - 9.55pm
Gatwick 9.20pm - 10.45pm

Accommodation has all been booked in several different b&bs and hotels in Tobermory.

Feel free to stay on after the Sunday if you wish to spend more time on this fabulous island.

Cost of the trip for each person is Â£275 excluding all travel costs and meals except for breakfast and is payable as follows :

Â£75 non refundable deposit to be paid by end of September

Â£200 balance payable by Friday 7th February.

If after the end of January you can no longer attend you will be able to offer your place to someone on the wait list.

You will be advised of payment details by private message.

Likely walks :

Thursday eve - Tobermory Lighthouse 2 hours

Friday morn ( bus at 7.30am ) - Isle of Iona ( south) 3 hours

Saturday - ( bus at 10am ) Langamull beach, Calgary Bay and Treshnish ( taxis back at 6pm from Ensay )

Sunday - Tobermory Aros Park 2 hours

We shall travel by public buses on the island.

You should be able to walk 2.5 miles per hour and have adequate and appropriate insurance for this type of activity.

Sick of Swiping?

To get your ticket click the following link:
https://lezbegay.co.uk/men-seeking-men/

Fancy having loads of dates instead of endless texts and ghosting? Get ready for a great night out in central London! Sip, flirt and laugh your way through a singles event like no other. Have 30 dates all in one night!

Who?

Single and fabulous people just like you. In fact, if you are not fabulous, this really isn\u2019t going to work out. It\u2019s not you, it\u2019s me. No wait, it is you. Sorry!

What?

You will have around 3 minutes per date with every person, with a short break in the middle to top up your drink! You will have a card to mark down if you are interested in your dates. It\u2019s very handy if you have a few too many cocktails, trust us!

At the end we will go through all the sheets, if you both said yes, you will get matched up and we will provide your contact details. This means that if you say yes to someone and they say no to you, they'll never know - similar to the tinder concept so win win!

We hope to see you at the event!

It is Valentine's Day week and if you are looking for to just go out meet new people then this is the perfect social for you to get to meet new friends and even get to spend Valentine's day together!

Join us for our Speed Friending evening to make new friendships with both ladies and gentlemen between the ages of 25 to 45 only at Be At One Bar!

Get ready to make some new friends this New Year! (There's no need to be alone!) Do you want to mingle and make new friends?

1. We have our area booked for Meetup / Denise

2. Denise is hosting the event. She will welcome you warmly at the venue and also introduce you to other attendees.

3. Dress code - Smart casual

4. We have 28 meetup groups in London with over 18000 members and we will be inviting members from all those groups to attend. This ensures that we always have a good number of people, with varied interests. You will meet a lot of new people. Members of other groups who RSVP are included as guests of the organiser in order to give you an idea of expected numbers.

5. The age group 25/45 is an indicative guideline. You are welcome to attend if you are a few years either side of the guideline. The intent is to get like minded people together and so the age group tends to be important.

**We are not a dating group. Our group is created to help ladies and gents meet and make new friends. At times we may not have a gender balance, so please do not attend if a gender balance is important to you.**

The JavaScript Eco System is moving to TypeScript. Fast. This workshop will explain why and when you might want to use TypeScript, and get you up and running with all the essentials. In this workshop we will cover practically the full language. And we will go deep. That is: do the cool and weird meta programming stuff. Learn all the tricks you won't find in the handbook.

This workshop is also suitable for those that have basic experience with TypeScript. Since the basics only take ~2 hours to cover, most of the day is still super valuable to enhance your TypeScript skills, even if you already have real project experience with TypeScript! Did you ever encounter super confusing types in some of the libraries you use? Did you get some super vague compiler errors? After this workshop you will be able to understand them!

Date: 26/3/[masked]:00 - 17:00

Michel Weststrate

Author of MobX, MobX-State-Tree, Immer and a plethora of smaller packages. On a quest to make programming as natural as possible. React, JavaScript and TypeScript fan. Working at Facebook on Dev tooling

It is a New year and if one of your resolutions is to get out more, meet new people and have more fun then join us in the starting weeks of the year to get started!

Join us for our Speed Friending evening to make new friendships with both ladies and gentlemen between the ages of 25 to 45 only at Be At One Bar!

Get ready to make some new friends this New Year! (There's no need to be alone!) Do you want to mingle and make new friends?

You wont be disappointed! Limited tickets!

Please click on the link below -
Eventbrite - https://tuesdayspe25.eventbrite.co.uk
OR
https://annualpass.eventbrite.co.uk

This Tuesday come out and do something different! Meet new friends and spend some time with like minded ladies and gents of your age group!

Don't miss this fun opportunity to make new friends!

Have a look at photos from our recent meetups and see what you have been missing! http://bit.ly/MeetupPictures

Few key points:

1. We have our area booked for Meetup / Denise

2. Denise is hosting the event. She will welcome you warmly at the venue and also introduce you to other attendees.

3. Dress code - Smart casual

4. We have 28 meetup groups in London with over 18000 members and we will be inviting members from all those groups to attend. This ensures that we always have a good number of people, with varied interests. You will meet a lot of new people. Members of other groups who RSVP are included as guests of the organiser in order to give you an idea of expected numbers.

5. The age group 25/45 is an indicative guideline. You are welcome to attend if you are a few years either side of the guideline. The intent is to get like minded people together and so the age group tends to be important.

**We are not a dating group. Our group is created to help ladies and gents meet and make new friends. At times we may not have a gender balance, so please do not attend if a gender balance is important to you.**

You can contact Denise through her meetup profile with any questions. (Or you can contact Dan on his meetup profile or on whatsapp on [masked])

--------------------------

Regular tickets - Â£10 each (plus charges)
If you do not purchase your tickets in advance then you can pay Â£15 cash at the meetup to Denise.

Please click on the link below -

Click on the link to purchase your Annual Pass today -
https://annualpass.eventbrite.co.uk

(Note - 100% cashback is offered to all online ticket buyers who attend and do not meet ladies and gents at our event. Please ask the host for help if you need it. A refund request has to be made through the ticketing system you use to purchase the ticket.)

Join us for the weekly social language exchange event every Wednesday at 6.30pm.

If you want to meet some new people, catch up with friends, chat with like-minded people, practise speaking in any languages you're learning, and enjoy some good cocktails then you're in the right place!

It's free, just show the door staff your photo ID and ask them for a wristband for the Mammoth language exchange event, and this will give you access to our private area downstairs and buy 1 get 1 free on cocktails.

It's best to arrive early, but it's fine to come a little later after work, and it's fine for you to come on your own. Everyone is welcoming and happy to chat. Most of the guys and girls come every Wednesday and make good friends there.

See you there this Wednesday at 6.30pm! :)

When you buy a ticket to an event you will receive confirmation after you have paid for your ticket, the host will also have your name on the guest list! (CASH Payment Won't Be Accepted at any events/ No Refunds) NO TICKET/ NO ENTRY/ VENUE RULES/
*****************************************
On arrival tell the SECURITY you have a reservation, you will be directed inside to check in with the HOST tell her reservation is called MEETUP! You will then be directed upstairs to another host, You must show VENUE HOST your confirmation ticket either printed out or screen shot on your phone. You will then be shown to the reserved MEETUP AREA which has been booked exclusively for the MEETUP members and guests.! MEETUP HOST has the drinks tokens and will introduce you to the other members....

This event is fully hosted, and the organizers will be on site to introduce and greet newcomers and well as regulars to each other. This event is run in conjunction with other meetup groups and there organizers along with there own members so the number of rsvp are always higher then what you see on the list, we have been running & hosting events for 7yrs now and all our events are exclusive venues.

Hold onto your hats, a new crew has landed in paradise. The Tropicana Cabaret Show is here! As you take your seats around our poolside paradise, your totally tropical host will guide you through a jungle of daring circus acts, fantastical vocal performances and live entertainment from start to finish.

From ferocious fire performing pirates, to gravity defying acrobatic bartenders, the night is packed with THE best entertainers from around the globe. You never know, if you are lucky you might end up being rescued by our very own phenomenally dexterous lifeguard\u2026

The party doesn\u2019t stop when the cabaret finishes as you\u2019re invited to join us for our club night and dance your way into the early hours.

HOST has arranged FREE FOOD for everyone : FREE food is a share of a sharing platter to pass around -they are provided complimentary and they have to go round the whole group. This is not your dinner just a bite to eat with your drink, but If you are still hungry, food is available to order from the bar menu.

A short walk from Holburn & Covent Garden Tube stations, on the corner of PARKER STREET & DRURY LANE - Next to the New London Theatre/

Please do some research and plan your journey using smartphone googlemaps/streetmap or just an old fashioned London A-Z prior to leaving and have some idea where you are going. Some places in London can be difficult to find and hosts cannot be held responsible for people getting lost or not able to find places.

Sick of Swiping?

To get your ticket click the following link:
https://lezbegay.co.uk/men-seeking-men/

Fancy having loads of dates instead of endless texts and ghosting? Get ready for a great night out in central London! Sip, flirt and laugh your way through a singles event like no other. Have 30 dates all in one night!

Who?

Single and fabulous people just like you. In fact, if you are not fabulous, this really isn\u2019t going to work out. It\u2019s not you, it\u2019s me. No wait, it is you. Sorry!

What?

You will have around 3 minutes per date with every person, with a short break in the middle to top up your drink! You will have a card to mark down if you are interested in your dates. It\u2019s very handy if you have a few too many cocktails, trust us!

At the end we will go through all the sheets, if you both said yes, you will get matched up and we will provide your contact details. This means that if you say yes to someone and they say no to you, they'll never know - similar to the tinder concept so win win!

We hope to see you at the event!

This meetup will focus on exploring the selves and what Digital Leaders are made of.

This meetup will kick off a research project to determine patterns of successful Digital work systems and the traits of Digital Leaders that work within and lead those.

The meetup will take the form of a workshop and explore with you the characteristics of great human work systems / knowledge work systems. We will then use the Lumina Spark tool, in a workshop format, to help you explore your character traits and connect those to your work system.

This will be an evening of discovery, both personal and of the human side of successful Digital Systems.

If you thought that Digital was about Technology (Data, AI, Blockchain, etc) or about processes (Agile everywhere), please join us and be ready to explore how much it is about people first and foremost.

We\u2019re going on a trip to Oxford!

It\u2019s Â£27 for the well-organised trip, 2-way transport by private coach from near Hammersmith station, guided tour of Oxford, and lots of travel buddies to make good friends.

---------- BOOK YOUR PLACE ----------
Places are limited so you need to book your place in advance. Book at least 10 days early for a little discount.

You can pay by debit card or credit card or PayPal through the UK Explorers website: https://ukexplorers.co.uk

If you want to pay by UK bank transfer or cash in advance then post a comment on this event or message us and we'll help you with this: https://ukexplorers.co.uk/contact-us

---------- OXFORD ----------
Oxford, the \u2018city of dreaming spires\u2019 is steeped in a rich and fascinating history. Famous for it\u2019s prestigious Oxford University and its 38 colleges, and for over 800 years it has been home to royalty and many notable scholars. The Radcliffe Camera, Bodleian Library and Bridge of Sighs make up just a few of the famous picturesque buildings of Oxford. Its charming scenery has been the inspiration for many, including Lewis Carroll and J.R.R Tolkien, and there are many recognisable scenes from popular films such as Harry Potter.

---------- TRIP HIGHLIGHTS ----------
\u2013 See the birthplace of Richard the Lionheart and Bad King John, the king who was forced to sign the Magna Carta, the first human rights document.
\u2013 Have a drink in the pub where CS Lewis and JRR Tolkein used to meet every week.
\u2013 Visit the Ashmolean Museum and its world famous collections.
\u2013 Walk through the Harry Potter dining room at Christ Church.
\u2013 Walk under the Bridge of Sighs, resembling the famous Bridge of Sighs in Venice.
\u2013 Visit some of the beautiful colleges of Oxford University.
\u2013 See the spectacular Radcliffe Camera building and the Bodleian Library.
\u2013 Visit the Alice In Wonderland shop.
\u2013 Climb to the top of the University Church of St Mary the Virgin and see the magnificent panorama of the university buildings and the city.

---------- ABOUT UK EXPLORERS ----------
We organise fun and professional day trips for you. Everything is taken care of, comfortable travel, a guided walk around our destinations to show you everything you need to see there, and free time to explore.

---------- TERMS & CONDITIONS ----------
Click here to read our Terms & Conditions: https://ukexplorers.co.uk/terms

---------- LET US HELP YOU ----------
If you have any questions or need help booking your place then we can help you. Just post a comment on this event and we'll get back to you shortly, or you can message us: https://ukexplorers.co.uk/contact-us

---------- MORE TRIPS & HIKES ----------
See the full list of trips and book your place on our website: https://ukexplorers.co.uk

We are hosting a Sunday afternoon Singles social for the ages between 21 to 45s and exclusively for only 30 members!

We know Sunday is the day to ease out and have fun! Think empty transport, open roads, laid-back Sunday afternoon atmosphere and so much time in hand!

Please click on the link below to purchase tickets -
Eventbrite - https://21amba.eventbrite.co.uk
OR
https://annualpass.eventbrite.co.uk

Imagine spending your day in a classy venue with a small cozy group of like-minded people of your age who are eager to connect with you and having engaging conversations over a drink or two in a quiet environment (None of that loud music!).

If you like the sound of that please join us on Sunday, 9th February 2020 (from 2:00 pm) at Amba hotel in the Terrace Bar (First floor). We assure you a superb atmosphere with civilized drinking, lots of fun talks and a beginning of lasting friendships!

For our Sunday Singles social we focus on having a small and very age focused group so that you have a better time, meet more like-minded people and leave our meetup with some new friends. Even if you are a bit shy you will easily blend in as it is a small and warm group and Tony will help with introductions and mingling.

We cannot guarantee a perfect gender match in terms of attendees but we will try and balance it to the maximum extent possible. From past experience however it never tends to be more adverse than 60:40 for either gender.

There's no need to get nervous at all because our lovely host Anna will warmly welcome you to the group and help you with introductions as well.

Event fee:
Early Bird tickets are only Â£10 each
Regular tickets are only Â£15 each
Cash at meetup to be Â£20 each to be paid to Anna when you meet her.

Please click on the link below to purchase tickets -
Eventbrite - https://21amba.eventbrite.co.uk

Annual Pass- Â£20 each - Attend all of our events for one payment! Valid for 12 months from date of purchase.

https://annualpass.eventbrite.co.uk

We are charging more for our singles social so that we get an elite and classy group of ladies and gentlemen.

Some Important Points

- We will start at 2:00 pm.

- We have our area booked for Anna/Meetup.

- Anna is hosting the event. She will welcome you warmly at the venue & will also give you a group wristband. Please wear this wristband as it will help other members identify you as a group member and you will be able to identify others. All you have to do is say hello to anyone else wearing the wristband as they are all our members and there to attend our meetup and make new friends.

- We have 28 meetup groups in London with over 180,000 members and we will be inviting members between the ages between 21 to 45s from most of these groups. You will meet a lot of new people. (Members of other groups who RSVP are included as guests of the organiser in order to give you an idea of expected numbers.)

**We are not a dating group. Our group is created to help ladies and gents meet and make new friends. At times we may not have a gender balance, so please do not attend if a gender balance is important to you.**
